entry.title: Sunday night: Rain. Low 6.
entry.summary: Rain ending overnight then cloudy. Fog patches developing before morning. Wind light except south 30 km/h over southern sections early this evening. Low 6. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Sunday 23 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers. High 14. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming south 20 km/h in the afternoon. High 14. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Sunday 23 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of showers or drizzle. Low 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers in the evening then 30 percent chance of drizzle overnight. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low 6. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Sunday 23 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of drizzle. High 15. POP 30%
